LanguageData.EthanolBlindness.label: Temporary blindness
LanguageData.EthanolBlindness.description: One of the short-term consequences of excessive alcohol consumption is vision loss.
LanguageData.PhoenixRugAura.label: Warmth from the Phoenix Mat
LanguageData.PhoenixRugAura.description: One of the short-term effects of being near a phoenix's skin is increased resistance to cold.
LanguageData.KirinRugAura.label: Coolness from the Kirin rug
LanguageData.KirinRugAura.description: One of the short-term effects of being near a kirin's skin is increased heat tolerance.
LanguageData.WyvernRugAura.label: Freshness from the wyvern rug
LanguageData.WyvernRugAura.description: One of the short-term effects of being near a wyvern hide is increased resistance to toxins.
LanguageData.BehirRugAura.label: Concentration from the Behira mat
LanguageData.BehirRugAura.description: One of the short-term effects of being near a behir's skin is increased intelligence. .
LanguageData.BagestRugAura.label: Darkness from the baguette rug
LanguageData.BagestRugAura.description: One of the short-term effects of being near a bagest skin is an increase in light perception. .
LanguageData.Carpet_Bite.label: Strange bite
LanguageData.Carpet_Bite.description: What was the carpet bite me? No, but it is better to accelerate.
LanguageData.BeeBite.label: Bee bite
LanguageData.BeeBite.description: What was the bite me? It is better to accelerate.
